name: Kororinpa: Marble Mania
overview: KEEP THE BALL ROLLING! Guide your marble to the goal by tilting, twisting and rotating fun and frantic mazes with the Wii Remote! • 20 kinds of marble variations with different control, playability and look and feel • Full 3D control, tip the world on its side, and even upside down! • Over 40 diverse stages packed with tricks, traps and secrets • Compete against a friend with a 2-player race mode
